message.body: I didn't see this! Yes send links!
Hey - what time next Saturday were you thinking of going to NYC? I was thinking of leaving Philly at 10am - wanna a ride?
Yes perfect!! That would be so great!
I'll chip in for gas and tolls!
Great! I think I will just drive straight to bk near the screening
Awesome. I will probably meet up with some friends in Manhattan for a quick bite before and then head back for the screening at 4 depending on what time we arrive.
We can try to leave at 9:30 if you feel that gives you more time?
It's up to you! I don't want us to feel rushed.
I am going to try to meet up with a friend and see some art before the screening so maybe 9:30 is a good time to leave
Awesome! See you then if not before
